channel.title: Health Points
channel.description:
Every time a creature attacks me it say it is taking 4 out, but it in the Stat menu it takes out over half.
How can I put the health points back into its original scale [br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 12:07:10 AM[/size][hr]would it be my max level?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 12:17:18 PM[/size][hr]I Fixed it, it was my max level!!
